txt.en: Listen to Khôltekh's explanation.
A Lock with No Key
Listen to Khôltekh's explanation
Listen to Khôltekh's explanation
Khôltekh has asked you back to his house once more, so he can think on the riddle of this key and access to Dâr Sêkhta.
'I have bad news, [placeholder]. I've solved our riddle.'
'Hmmm... Hmmm...'
'What was it our rambunctious friend said?'
Ask Khôltekh about his thoughts on the matter.
'The way is barred, and the keys are scarce, and quite valuable...'
Accompany Khôltekh to his study
'Quite valuable. Could they be made of gold?'
'No, that doesn't work, too soft.'
Listen to Khôltekh's thoughts on the key.
'The keys - multiple keys, there are multiple keys. Why?'
'Deep narrow grooves carved into the stone face.'
'Five points in a semicircle, like a hoof or...'
'I don't feel like giving my hand up, how about you?'
Ask Khôltekh about his thoughts on the matter
Listen to Khôltekh's thoughts on the key
'Luckily the wights have plenty to spare.'
Accompany Khôltekh to his study.
'About time they started pulling their weight for Umbar. Ho ho!'
Listen to Khôltekh's explanation.
'Let us go back to Dâr Laja. The way is clear for us once again!'
